name: Marintruder
description:
In a Subaquatic Mutant Planet the sea is a vast deep surface of water that is home to many monster! 

In those waters  a baby creature is hatched and needs to fight his way through all the other monsters bigger them him, to do that he must eat what he can without dying while exploring that unknown World to Survive.

Truly a game of kill or get killed! 

To Grow: 

5 ball of flesh and then you can eat the crabs creatures

10 crabs and you can eat tentacles monsters

Then another creature and so on... have fun
